product.name: Yopay 2 Pack Stair Basket with Leather Handle, Upgraded Foldable Step Basket Bins for Stairs, Felt Staircase Storage Organizer with Supporting Insert for Carpeted Wooden Stair, Book, Clothes, Computer
product.description:
Smart Life, Fashion Choice
We are committed to providing a variety of cost-effective home products, providing you with a comfortable shopping experience.
product.bullet_points:
• You will get 2 pack stair basket, each measures 16.5" L x 10" W x 15.75" H, which fit all standard-sized stairs perfectly; Suitable for storing and organizing books, magazines, clothes, toys, blankets, craft items, pet toys, craft supplies.
• Upgraded Stair Basket with Insert Pad: Our stair storage bins are made of premium felt material (600 grams ) with two leather handle and 3D structural support panel, which are sturdy and durable, won't scratch wood floors or snag on carpeted stairs.
• Our innovative staircase storage basket is perfectly placed on both steps of the staircase. This is a great way to utilize unused space! The basket will go from L-shape to pancake when not in use. Each collapsible stair organizer can be tucked into a closet, laundry room, pantry, bath room, kitchen, office, bedroom.
• Efficient and Foldable: Each bin comes with two strong handles allowing you to transport it anywhere you need to; Our stairstep basket is ceatived L-shape also collapses flat, making it easy to store when not in use.
• Each basket holds a good amount of things, stuff and looks good on the stairs. It's large enough to hold all the items that need to be taken upstairs all at once. Saves so much time and effort. It's also very easy to assemble.
features: You will get 2 pack stair basket, each measures 16.5" L x 10" W x 15.75" H, which fit all standard-sized stairs perfectly; Suitable for storing and organizing books, magazines, clothes, toys, blankets, craft items, pet toys, craft supplies.

Upgraded Stair Basket with Insert Pad: Our stair storage bins are made of premium felt material (600 grams ) with two leather handle and 3D structural support panel, which are sturdy and durable, won't scratch wood floors or snag on carpeted stairs.

Our innovative staircase storage basket is perfectly placed on both steps of the staircase. This is a great way to utilize unused space! The basket will go from L-shape to pancake when not in use. Each collapsible stair organizer can be tucked into a closet, laundry room, pantry, bath room, kitchen, office, bedroom.

Efficient and Foldable: Each bin comes with two strong handles allowing you to transport it anywhere you need to; Our stairstep basket is ceatived L-shape also collapses flat, making it easy to store when not in use.

Each basket holds a good amount of things, stuff and looks good on the stairs. It's large enough to hold all the items that need to be taken upstairs all at once. Saves so much time and effort. It's also very easy to assemble.
